title: Number of eSports games players worldwide 2017
summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Sport, and Number of players in millions in each Sport on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players in millions 100.0 is found at Sport League of Legends and the minimum is found at StarCraft II where Sport is 2.4.
The highest Sport League of Legends has 97.6 more Number of players in millions than the lowest Sport StarCraft II.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of players in millions for 9 number of Sports.
The Number of players in millions is highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 9 columns on the x axis representing Sport, and Number of players in millions in each Sport on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players in millions 100.0 is found at Sport League of Legends and the minimum is found at StarCraft II where Sport is 2.4.
The highest Sport League of Legends has 97.6 more Number of players in millions than the lowest Sport StarCraft II.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sport in the x axis and Number of players in millions in the y axis.
The Number of players in millions is appeared to be the highest at Sport League of Legends and lowest at Sport StarCraft II.
The difference of Number of players in millions between the highest and lowest Sport is 97.6.
The Sport League of Legends has the highest Number of players in millions, followed by Call of Duty, and Hearthstone. Down to the Sport StarCraft II which is the lowest.
Sport World of Tanks, and FIFA 17 share the same value 12.3.
The Sport StarCraft II has 4.28 times less Number of players in millions than average.
